reviews.review:
梦开始的地方
安装只需几分钟，却花一生的时间来精通
зашёл сразу в ебало дали вышел игра понравилась
eski bir oyuna göre güzel tam nostaljik
Oyunu indirim zamanı paket halinde satın aldım. Güzel bir nostalji yaşattı çocukluğuma götürdü, hala sarıyor :D

The legendary game that changed the world
There is probably no such person on earth who is a PC user and has never heard of such a legendary game as Counter-Strike. Although who would have thought that a mod for another legendary hit called Half Life would also gain such great popularity! I got to know CS only in 2008, and then only because I was given a disc, but at that time the game made a very strong impression on me! And sometimes playing cards like cs_office and de_nuke again from time to time get goosebumps from nostalgia.

However, if you are not familiar with the platinum classic of the multiplayer shooter, then I will give you a little excursion. According to the standard, there are four modes: planting a bomb, releasing hostages, escorting a VIP person and escaping. The last two modes have long been dead, but the first two still have a large audience. All players are divided into two teams: special forces and terrorists. In the first mode, standard maps have two bombs. In hostage mode, the special forces must take all the hostages to a safe area.

By completing the set goals on the map and eliminating enemies, we get money that can be spent on ammunition. And here it is worth remembering about the arsenal of weapons, the assortment is quite large: pistols, shotguns, PPs, rifles (including sniper ones) and a machine gun. You can also buy equipment in the form of a set of armor, grenades and night vision goggles. Each weapon is unique in its own way: rate of fire, fast movement, bullet dispersion, recoil and reload time. You can carry one main weapon, a pistol, a knife, and three grenades at a time.

After the purchase, everything is decided by your skill to shoot well and the ability to behave with the team (the former often decides). Often, the ability to shoot well is on a level with a tactical layout: with the same level of cunning, the winner is often the one who can be the first to successfully slap a dose of lead into his opponent. It's also worth noting that the damage depends on the area you hit and whether the opponent has armor. That is, if you hit an opponent with an M4A1 in the head without a helmet, then a shot in 100% of the case will be fatal for him, but having a set of armor, he can still survive and try to kill you.

Also, over the years of the game's existence, its community has created a bunch of mods and various modes, which will undoubtedly give the game life for at least several more decades.

Conclusion. Game-Legend. And despite the fact that most of the players have already switched to CS: GO for a long time, for the sake of being able to mow the dough using different methods. But Counter-Strike 1.6 will forever remain the one and only for me. 10/10

It's a fun game that we all should play and have fun in it!!

Всегда самая лучшая, олды тут? Кс 1.6 давно уже пережил сам себя, она останется в наших сердцах навсегда. Вызывает ностальгию по тем временам когда толпой собирались с пацанами и шли в самый захудалые компы которые находились у кого то на хате на районе. Было проведено много десятков времени за этой крутой игрой.

You know what they say: "You won't ever replace the original". Out of all Counter-strike games, this one is my most played one (Steam+Nosteam time) and probably most enjoyable one, head to head with CS Source. It is conventional at its core and I love it. Community server browser with loads of servers to play on, many different modes to choose from. It offers you a lot and it has infinite replayability. The core of the FPS is very well established with a gun menu to choose from as well as extra equipment such as armor, grenades, night-vision, etc. Basic Counter-terrorist vs Terrorist gameplay with vanilla missions being Arm/Defuse a bomb and Protect/Rescue hostages. Graphics are bad, expectedly with the GoldSrc engine but let's face it we are all used to them by now. Physics are sloppy and you can at times look through the whole map because of one corner. The shooting recoil is very bad as well. There are a lot of cheaters even nowadays and sometimes servers have too many addons and mods. Honestly, all of this is unnecessary - it's a classic, it's cheap on sales and it is a top-tier FPS - buy it!

Score - 10/10
это лучшая игра за все время 10/10
Мои друзья говноеды а я дробовичник
Лучшая игра всех времен и народов
basit silahların ismi gerçek değil ama yineden oldlar bilir bu bizim bir parçamız

Армянин выпустил из бутылки джинна. Джинн на радостях пообещал, что исполнит любое одно его желание. Армянин говорит: — Хочу видеть, как моя мама дарит моей дочери бриллиантовое колье стоимостью в один миллион долларов, купленное с ее месячной пенсии, сидя в моем Мерседесе, припаркованном у моей виллы на берегу Средиземного моря
Juegazo, Es facil de entender, y corre en cualquier pc. El mejor cs.

Va a hacer muy bueno recordar esos momentos en los que ibas a cabinas de internet y jugabas con tus patas a este juegazo :3 , valio la pena haberlo adquirido para revivir su esencia de este shooter ,que aunque hayan pasado los años sigue entreteniendo a muchas personas que buscan pasar un buen rato jugando...
mto foda melhor q o go sem sombra de duvida

800 g de polvilho azedo
1 xícara de água
1 xícara de leite
1/2 xícara de óleo
2 ovos
100 g de queijo parmesão ralado
sal a gosto
MODO DE PREPAROO
Em uma panela, ferva a água e acrescente o leite, o óleo e o sal.

Adicione o polvilho aos poucos até dar liga. Pode ser que você não precise usar os 800g, então coloque devagar e sove a massa até soltar da mão: esse é o ponto.

Quando a massa estiver morna, acrescente o queijo parmesão, os ovos e misture bem.

Unte as mãos e enrole bolinhas de 2 cm de diâmetro.

Disponha as bolinhas em uma assadeira untada com óleo, deixando um espaço entre elas.

Asse em forno médio (180º C), preaquecido, por cerca de 40 minutos.
